title: [do not merge] temporary fix: trying to patch generated headers to use const instead of constexpr
body_html: This is an experiment to see if we can temporarily patch protobuf gen files to avoid having constexpr, which nvcc complains at this moment on windows machines (see https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/19383/console)
